dcterms:description: A dataset containing restaurant reviews from Yelp, used for sentiment transfer tasks, where reviews are labeled as positive or negative based on their ratings.
dcterms:title: Yelp restaurant review sentiment transfer dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset from Yahoo containing questions categorized into different topics, used for topic transfer tasks.
dcterms:title: Yahoo QA topic transfer dataset
